entry.title: Sunday: Rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning this afternoon. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia late this afternoon. Temperature steady near 10. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Rain. Low 7.
entry.summary: Rain ending overnight then cloudy. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind light except southeast 30 km/h near the Strait of Georgia early this evening. Low 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 12. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. High 12. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM PDT Sunday 23 April 2023
